document.full_text: american brandt snedeker won the heritage in a thrilling playoff with luke donald sunday, denying the briton the chance to become world number for the first time monday.
document.title: snedeker clinches heritage in playoff with donald
lines_and_colors: american brandt snedeker won the heritage in a thrilling playoff with luke donald sunday, denying the briton the chance to become world number for the first time monday.
